subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After an embarrassing turnover to end a loss to the Raptors in Game 5, the Nets backup center Andray Blatche bounced back to help them tie the series.
snippet: After an embarrassing turnover to end a loss to the Raptors in Game 5, the Nets backup center Andray Blatche bounced back to help them tie the series.
